title: krishnaverma
author: krishnaverma
content: Link to newshttps://www.yahoo.com/now/trump-badly-photoshopped-nfts-appear-223000580.htmlI thought it will be interesting that Trump has launched his official NFT. But at least he should have made some effort to user original content for it.

comments.author: avikz
comments.body: Lol! The pictures are hilarious! Also what's surprising is that, all NFTs are sold out within a single day! That effectively proves that even garbages can be sold as NFT and that will also make you a good amount of profit for no reason or effort. The entire NFT ecosystem is non sense and the biggest non-sense leader of all time, has joined the bandwagon! Like a match made in heaven.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: The clothes models from the shops are identical to the ones on Trump's NFTs, but with so many brands nowadays selling the same clothes models, isn't that normal he would wear clothes from one brand or another? I see no issues on this. After all, he has to wear something on his NFTs...The worst part of the story is there are people willing to pay 99$ to own those useless cards. I think it couldn't even be considered an investment.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: avikz on December 19, 2022, 05:57:31 PMLol! The pictures are hilarious! Also what's surprising is that, all NFTs are sold out within a single day! That effectively proves that even garbages can be sold as NFT and that will also make you a good amount of profit for no reason or effort. The entire NFT ecosystem is non sense and the biggest non-sense leader of all time, has joined the bandwagon! Like a match made in heaven. It has something to do with the ticket attached to each cardQuote” He then says “each card comes with an automatic chance to win amazing prizes like dinner with me. I don’t know if that’s an amazing prize but it’s what we have.”Everyone wants to have dinner with Trump, of course, it can give you social media hype and if you're a social media influencer it will give you mileage and you can use it to promote your channels but many are surprised with the use of cheap photoshopped card unthinkable for the richest man in the world.

comments.author: big kid
comments.body: That NFT collection was hilarious in the first place, but now it's turned into a real shitshow. And people are actually buying it! The world is mad.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Quote from: big kid on December 20, 2022, 06:21:33 AM-snip-Who cares about the NFTs.Do we really care about pictures? heck now, most of the people who are buying is see opportunity just because "FOMO" not because the picture, project or other think. They're hoping the collection is gonna to get shill on "TRUMP" social media.Make it FOMO, but I doubt he not gonna to do that.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: Quote from: avikz on December 19, 2022, 05:57:31 PMLol! The pictures are hilarious! Also what's surprising is that, all NFTs are sold out within a single day! That effectively proves that even garbages can be sold as NFT and that will also make you a good amount of profit for no reason or effort. The entire NFT ecosystem is non sense and the biggest non-sense leader of all time, has joined the bandwagon! Like a match made in heaven. The super nonsense is the NFT items that are not worth it because they came from nonsense but still people are willing to sacrifice millions of dollars for it to create a temporary hype to promote to the people and when it happened, they will introduce their arts which will gonna be worth more than that and so on so forth. I think if it's only art from popular artists it would likely make sense and also they made the price not too high. Right now, the trend is the metaverse and it has lots of support from all over the world.
